statuses.label: Pending: Awaiting initial review or approval
Approved: Reviewed and approved for processing
In Process: Procurement ongoing, including vendor selection, negotiations, etc.
Awarded: Contract awarded to a selected vendor
Contract Signed: Formally signed with the vendor
Order Placed: Order for goods/services placed with vendor
Completed: Entire process completed, including receipt, acceptance, and payment
Under Review: Detailed review of request or process
